wikipedia_page.main: Steve Ellis (born 29 February 1968) is a British lightweight rower. He won a gold medal at the 1994 World Rowing Championships in Indianapolis with the lightweight men's eight.

response: Steven or Steve Ellis may refer to:
* Steve Ellis (comics) (born 1971), American comic book artist and illustrator
*Steve Ellis (literary scholar) (born 1952), British literary scholar and poet
